alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Caddo; Canadian; Kingfisher (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 3:48PM CDT until July 08 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Kingfisher County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southern Blaine County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northern Canadian County in central Oklahoma... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 348 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Okarche to 4 miles south of Geary to 4 miles southeast of Hydro, and are nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... El Reno, Hinton, Geary, Okarche, Hydro, Calumet, Bridgeport and Concho. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
